bluebird.layers.flatten.Flatten¶

class bluebird.layers.flatten.Flatten(input_size: Tuple)¶

Bases: bluebird.layers.input.Input

Type of input layer It transforms n*m matrix into a list It should be the first layer in a network

Parameters

input_size – dimensions of a n*m matrix, Type: Tuple

Example

>>> input = Flatten((5, 10))
>>> net = NeuralNet([
            input,
            ...
        ])
__init__(input_size: Tuple) → None¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
